headline: Zimmer Biomet (ZBH) Valuation Check After Fresh Evercore Upgrade To Outperform
summary: Zimmer Biomet Holdings (ZBH) is back in focus after Evercore ISI Group upgraded the stock from In Line to Outperform, a shift that follows earlier downgrades and signals changing analyst sentiment. See our latest analysis for Zimmer Biomet Holdings. Recent analyst calls, including the latest upgrade, come as Zimmer Biomet’s share price sits at $94.08, with short term momentum improving but longer term total shareholder returns over 1, 3 and 5 years remaining negative.
